description.p: A change was made to disable the Upload button for the File and Image Upload Action Javascript actions. As a result of this change, you may need to recalculate your Grid and UX components that use this action.

discussion.p: A change was made to the *[ui:File Upload]* and *[ui:Image Upload]* actions to disable the Upload button while the file upload is in progress. As a result of this change it may be necessary (in some cases it was not necessary - depends on when the Action was last edited) to edit and save the file and image upload actions in Action Javascript in order to re-generate the JavaScript code for the function.
This change affects both Grids and UX components that use the *[ui:File Upload]* and *[ui:Image Upload]* action.
